definition: (of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: They climbed a mountain whose peak was covered with snow.
sentences.chinese: 他们登上了覆盖着雪的那座山的峰顶。

sentences.english: The title hopes to go upward, the wall signs thousand Rens, and the jade pillar apex Yao can not climb.
sentences.chinese: 抬头向上望去，壁立千仞，玉柱峰顶遥不可攀。

sentences.english: The light of the setting sun suffused the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 落日余晖离开了峰顶，谷内暮色苍茫。

sentences.english: Standing on the Hushan Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 站在虎山长城的峰顶举目望去。

sentences.english: At its summit is a rock only about six meters across.
sentences.chinese: 峰顶是一块仅仅6米见方的岩石。

sentences.english: It is surrounded by two peaks; The Elephant and the Lion Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 被大象山和狮子山这两座峰顶所环围。

sentences.english: There is a natural-cave in south-west top, can hold a hundred people. or Hungry Tiger Peak.
sentences.chinese: 峰顶西南有一天然洞穴，可容百余人，俗称饿虎峰。

sentences.english: Peak overlooks, Anlu panoramic view of the county seat.
sentences.chinese: 峰顶眺望，安陆县城尽收眼底。

sentences.english: When the sun rising on the tree top of Dongyue Mount.
sentences.chinese: 当太阳跃上东岳峰顶的树梢。

sentences.english: I run onto the summit and I shake my ice axes at the sun.
sentences.chinese: 我在峰顶之上狂奔，对着太阳炫耀我的冰镐。

sentences.english: We reached the snow-covered summit in a day and a half.
sentences.chinese: 我们用了一天半的时间爬上了积雪覆盖的峰顶。

sentences.english: And you'll run for the hills from the groper.
sentences.chinese: 而且你会从摸索大胆地转向“峰顶”。

sentences.english: Summits are higher and can be very windy, and the weather can change on a dime.
sentences.chinese: 峰顶比较高，风会很大，天气也是瞬息万变。

sentences.english: Its peaks now show as islands scattered along the coast.
sentences.chinese: 它们的峰顶显现为沿着海岸散布的岛屿。

sentences.english: Let the survival of the human re-select the peak.
sentences.chinese: 就让人类重新选择生存的峰顶。

definition: halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
the peaks of a mountain range
